name: @whthduck/playtodied-bot
description: Joins voice channels and all that stuff

scripts.image:podman: podman build -t playtodied-bot . && podman push playtodied-bot whthduck/playtodied-bot:${npm_package_version}
scripts.image:docker: docker build -t playtodied-bot . && docker push playtodied-bot whthduck/playtodied-bot:${npm_package_version}

author: whthduck
